headline: Otis Kicks off Latest Made to Move Communities™ STEM Education Challenge
summary: As natural disasters increase in frequency and intensity, students participating in the Otis Made to Move Communities program this school year will apply artificial intelligence and STEM skills to design mobility solutions to support communities and first responders before, during and after natural disasters.

content.title: Otis Kicks off Latest Made to Move Communities™ STEM Education Challenge
content.summary: As natural disasters increase in frequency and intensity, students participating in the Otis Made to Move Communities program this school year will apply artificial intelligence and STEM skills to design mobility solutions to support communities and first responders before, during and after natural disasters.

thumbnail.caption: Otis mechanic AgustCn (left) and Operations Manager Miguel first met when AgustCn was a student in the Made to Move Communities Program. When a job opened up at the local Otis branch, AgustCn applied and was hired. Their story is an example of how the Made to Move Communities program builds real-world talent and encourages future careers at Otis and in the industry.
